A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Killed star-wars for me. Ruined Luke\, made the First Order into buffoons. If I wanted Team Rocket level antics from major villains\, I'd just go watch Saturday morning cartoons. Theres a myriad of issues with the film just beyond that\, but I'm not willing to write a 2\,000 word essay on why I hate this. Theres more articulate reviews left concerning the problems with the film. In a word\, its a string of scenes written before the story\, and then plot contrivances connecting them\, with little concern to the overall universe and existing characters.
